Name: Percentage of cases that eventually reach Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities that follow First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities per case
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities that occur after RW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch compared to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases with Awaiting Assignment to Batch that started with Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of times Awaiting Assignment to Batch is preceded by Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities in variants that include First Look-Please submit updates
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Please submit updates'

Name: Ratio of Awaiting Assignment to Batch to First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch in successful review processes ending with RW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'RW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities that occur in variants with major revisions
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities relative to Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of review processes that complete with Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch compared to other final-stage activities
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of cases with multiple Manuscript Export Succeeded before Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Number of days between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities that follow overdue first look updates
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch in processes with co-author account creation
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' occurs

Name: Ratio of Awaiting Assignment to Batch to all manuscript submission confirmation types
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch in each process variant
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities grouped by the last value of code
